description: Health Minister David Ashford says a "modern legal framework" to protect the vulnerable is "vital".
title: Isle of Man government proposes 'long overdue' change to power of attorney
title_page: Isle of Man government proposes 'long overdue' change to power of attorney - BBC News
maintext: The new laws would also give the courts the authority to appoint someone to hold power of attorney, if such a person has not been selected by the time capacity is lost, and mean advance decisions made by patients about future care would be protected.
